name: STOP DJVUS Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .djvus extension has been renamed and encrypted by STOP Djvus ransomware . The file could be an encrypted document, image, video, or other type of file. Because the file is encrypted, you cannot open it. Typically, the .djvus extension is added to the file's normal extension, resulting in a file with an extension like .docx.djvus .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
